In the Shadows

No sleep
No sleep until I am done with finding the answer
Won't stop
Won't stop before I find a cure for this cancer
Sometimes
I feel I going down and so disconnected
Somehow
I know that I am haunted to be wanted

I've been watching
I've been waiting
In the shadows all my time
I've been searching
I've been living
For tomorrows all my life

In the shadows

In the shadows

They say
That i must learn to kill before i can feel safe
But I
I rather kill myself then turn into their slave
Sometimes
I feel that I should go and play with the thunder
Somehow
I just don't wanna stay and wait for a wonder

I've been watching

In the shadows all my time
I've been searching
I've been living
For tomorrows all my life

Lately I been walking walking in circles, watching waiting for something
Feel me touch me heal me, come take me higher

Growing Wings

Crimson lights the sky, the bird still asleep
Like a dream it shines, from heaven's safe keep
Childrens songs we sung, as soft as the breeze
Endless fields, our home, I long for those days

I call out these prayers to the sky, heavy with thought, see your face
I carry these memories inside, thoughts of a soul colored by love
See me grow wings and fly high, passions will die down below
I burn in a basin of fire, watchers look on as they dance in their merciless sky
Watching me, watching you

Silent black, the dawn, and time tell its tale
Darkened blood, it flows, the forest receives
Look within the dark as deep as you dare
There inside you find destruction you seek

I call out these prayers to the sky, heavy with thought, see your face
I carry these memories inside, thoughts of a soul colored by love
See me grow wings and fly high, passions will die down below
I burn in a basin of fire, watchers look on as they dance in their merciless sky
Watching me, watching you

Mood Ring

we all know the girls that i am talking about
well they are time bombs and they are ticking
and the only question's when they'll blow up
and they'll blow up; we know that without a doubt
cause they're those girls, yeah you know those girls that let their emotions get the best of them

and i've contrived some sort of a plan to help my fellow man
let's get emotional girls to all wear mood rings
so we'll be tipped off to when they're ticked off
cause we'll know just what they're thinking
cause what they're thinking...

she's so pretty but she but doesn't always act that way
her mood's out swinging on the swing set almost every day
she said to me that she's so happy it's depressing
and all i said was "someone get that girl a mood ring"

if it's drama you want then look no further
they're like the real world meets boy meets world meets days of our lives
and it just kills me how they get away with murder
they'll anger you then bat their eyes; those pretty eyes that watch you sympathize

and i've contrived some sort of a plan to help my fellow man
let's get emotional girls to all wear mood rings
so we'll be tipped off to when they're ticked off
cause we'll know just what they're thinking
cause what they're thinking...

she's so pretty but she but doesn't always act that way
her mood's out swinging on the swing set almost every day
she said to me that she's so stressed out that it's soothing
and all i said was "someone get that girl a mood ring"

cause when it's black (it) means watch your back because you're probably
the last person in the world right now she wants to see
and when it's blue it means that you should call her up immediately
and ask her out because she'll most likely agree
and when it's green it simply means that she is really stressed
and when it's clear it means she's completely emotionless (and that's all right i must confess)

we all know the girls that i am talking about
she liked you wednesday but now it's friday and she has to wash her hair
and it just figures that we'll never figure them out
first she's jekyll and then she's hyde....at least she makes a lovely pair

mood ring oh mood ring
oh tell me will you bring
the key to unlock this mystery
of girls and their emotions
play it back in slow motion
so i may understand the complex infrastructure known as the female mind

[speaking:]
heh...that's terrible

In My Room

2:45 and the bell went off,
thank god
many people think im odd
but i talk with no one and I walk alone and I aviod sunlight with a chalky tone I get home and dont say hi,
it aint no one there
I dont care I walk in and go right up the stairs to my room,
get in bed and just for for dark,
because that's when the real show starts (tap tap)
"tap tap" on the glass go the piece of ass,
so young and pretty it's to bad she past
but she comes to my room and we talk at night,
she's demonic and bloody,
but she holds me tight
In my bedroom
with her I'm never alone,
and I kiss her cold lips until the morning come
and she gone,
I can still hear her voice loom,
but she only exist in the dark of my room
LOVE...
(I can't ignore you)
IN MY ROOM...
(do anything for you baby)(Tap Tap)
LOVE...(I do adore you)
IN MY ROOM...(Tap Tap go the piece of ass)
YOU AND I (x2)

I try to smile alot but I'm always frontin',
but I do love a ghost and at least that's somthin'
She dont talk much,
when she do it gets cold,
Usually we just lay there and we hold each other
we're lovers,
we don't need others,
one of my mothers cats jumped up on the covers
and it scared my baby,
guess she dont like pets
so I twisted it's fuckin head off at the neck
look baby,
it's bloody,
it's gone,
it's doomed,
please
come back to the room
I'll do anything for thy,
don't ignore me,
this is more than a sick love story
without you I'd bring a shot gun to school and I will if you want me to.
For any reason
I hate that you leave when the lights come on
And if I had it my way the fuckin' sun would be gone
(chourse x2)
Sometimes I kiss her,
I start shakin',
She slips me the toungue and it's taste like bacon
Uh-oh,
Somthing's wrong
baby's upset,
she told me she was spotted by the neighbor's kid
She can't come back now 'cuase they know our secret,
unless I can make them keep it.
If I do she may come to life,
now I'm in their yard with a shotgun and knife
Cut the screen,
went in and found the kid,
blew a bowl of spaghetti in the side of his head
the daddy was next runnin' down the hall,
I shredded his throat and he was quick to fall
Tossed the Mossberg and gripped the knife,
started stabbin' the shit outta his wife
Went home a bloody mess with a job well done,(Tap Tap)
wash up and wait for my baby to come
(chourse x2)

I waited 2 or 3 days
4 days,
waitin for the tap tap like always
I waited
and hated this(Tap Tap) I
created a bloody mess (Tap Tap)
I waited 2 or 3 months
4 months
waitn' for the tap tap just for once
I waited
and hated this (Tap Tap) I
created a bloody mess (Tap Tap)
I waited 2 or 3 days
4 days,
waitin for the tap tap like always
I waited
and hate this (Tap Tap) I
created a bloody mess (Tap Tap)
I waited 2 or 3 months
4 months
waitn' for the tap tap just for once
I waited
and hated this (Tap Tap) I
created a bloody mess (Tap Tap)

What I've Done

In this farewell
There’s no blood
There’s no alibi
‘Cause I’ve drawn regret
From the truth
Of a thousand lies

[Pre-Chorus]
So let mercy come
And wash away
What I’ve done

[Chorus]
I’ve faced myself
To cross out what I’ve become
Erase myself
And let go of what I’ve done

Put to rest
What you thought of me
Well I cleaned this slate
With the hands
Of uncertainty

[Pre-Chorus]
[What I've Done lyrics on http://www.metrolyrics.com]

So let mercy come
And wash away
What I’ve done

[Chorus]
I’ve faced myself
To cross out what I’ve become
Erase myself
And let go of what I’ve done

For what I’ve done
I’ll start again
And whatever pain may come
Today this ends
I’m forgiving what I’ve done

[Chorus]
I’ve faced myself
To cross out what I’ve become
Erase myself
And let go of what I’ve done

What I’ve done
Forgiving what I’ve done

Let me apologize to begin with
Let me apologize for what I'm about to say

Valentine's Day

My insides all turned to ash / So slow
And blew away as I collapsed / So cold
A black wind took them away / From sight
And held the darkness over day / that night

And the clouds above move closer
looking so dissatisfied
but the heartless wind kept blowing, blowing

I used to be my own protection / But not now
Cause my path had lost direction / Somehow
A black wind took you away / From sight
And held the darkness over day / That night

And the clouds above more closer
looking so dissatisfied
and the ground below grew colder
as they put you down inside
but the heartless wind kept blowing, blowing

So now you're gone
And I was wrong
I never knew what it was like
To be alone

She reminds me of the one in school,
when I was gutted she was dressed in white.
And I couldn't take my eyes off her,
but that's not what I took off that night,.
She'll never cover up what we did with her dress.
No.
She said "kiss me it'll heal,
but it won't forget".
"Kiss me it'll heal,
but it won't forget".

I don't mind you keeping me on pins and needles.
If I could stick to you,
and stick me too.

that blue is getting me high.

Becoming the Bull

Come on!!!

Grab the bull by the horns the old adage goes.
Nobody tells you where to go from there.
Seems like fate's pulling you.
Decisions have to be made.
The best path is the hardest earned.

Back and forth the struggle consumes us all.
Trying to keep a level head.
In the most unsettling of times.
Today I'll become the bull.

There is so much to stake.
I stumble I lose my place.
Pride and arrogance surrounded by sin.
Destiny takes its hold.
Fight it or let it go.
But I choose how the day will end.

Back and forth the struggle consumes us all.
Trying to keep a level head.
In the most unsettling of times.
Today I become the bull. [x2]

This walk can get lonely.
I lose myself inside my head.
No one can touch you when you're outside staring in.
Remove myself from this rat race.

Back and forth the struggle consumes us all.
Trying to keep a level head.
In the most unsettling of times.
Today I become the bull. [x5]

I Just Have to Point This Out

How is it possible for everyone to have a perfect match for them out there when a guy in the army could die and the very next day his girl friend could be dating another guy?
She'd cry for a while, but the truth is there are no perfect matches because there are some people that will never find love...

Love...

Love...
What is this warm sensation?
This feeling that is so soft...
This thing that makes my heartbeat race...
Yet...
Tears me to pieces...
Turns my heart to coal...
Love...

Love...
What is this contagion?
This pain is like thorns...
This thing that makes me wait... wait for death...
Yet...
So many people experience it...
Nobody seems to feel the way I do...
Love...

Love...
What is it?
It is nothing but a plain flower...
It is a rose...
It smells as sweet as it looks beautiful...
but...
No matter what you are going to get your hand cut...
Your hand will always get cut by that rose's thorns...
Love...

Love...
Love is nothing but a pain that people seem to enjoy...
Love...

Love, Romance, Suicide

Love, Romance, Suicide
By: Ethan M. Hirn

Every day…
Everywhere…
It disgusts me…
Hurts me…
Tears me apart…
They seem to do it on purpose…
Like they know what it does to me…
They know and don’t care…
Don’t care that it makes me closer…
Closer and closer to the end…
The end of my life…
Love…
Romance…
It makes me sick…
Is it meant to make you happy?
Or is it only used to torture?
Torture those who never will feel…
Never will feel love…
To make them feel more alone?
No…
Not to make them feel alone…
To make them closer…
Closer to the end…
Closer to that friendly word…
That word that seems horrible at first…
But…
But slowly it starts to seem like destiny…
Their only way…
The only true experience they will ever feel…
What is this word?
Is it love?
Love…
If it were love they’d have been happier a long time ago…
No…
No one loves these low lives…
Is it romance?
Romance…
If it were that they’d be going on with life…
No…
These fools will never feel romance…
What is it?
What is this accursed word?
Is it hate?
Hate…
These poor useless creatures felt hate their entire lives…
They would never want anyone to feel that…
Feel that pain…
No…
It is…
It is suicide…
The one word that gives an ending to pain…
An ending to sorrow…
An ending to hate…
An ending to love…
An ending to Romance…
An end…
A true end…
And you know what they feel?
They feel…
Free…
…

~*Dedicated to all the useless time I spent trying to be happy*~

Objects

Objects...
I am an object...
There are many people that may say I am not an object...
But I am nothing but an object...
I will harm...
I will destroy...
I will lie...
I will cheat...
I will steal...
I will even kill...
I will do everything that an useless object does...
I will not enjoy life...
I will not live...
I will only be an object...
An object to be hated by all who see me...
I am just a pile of filth...
A pile of smelly disgusting putrid filth...
And no one chall touch me...
I shall not feel...
I shall only be an object...
An object to be ignored...
An object to be shunned...
A waste of materials...
I am just a thing...
A pointless plaything...
And no one shall care...
Objects the world is filled with them...
All of them have uses...
I am not useful...
I only can cause pain and sadness to myself and otheres...
I can not contact others...
No one wants to contact me...
Nobody talks to an object...
I am an onject...
I only have myself...
And for the rest of my uneventfully slow and long life I shall stay an object...
An useless object that is never listened to...

See What I See...

Lies...
Owned by every little word that comes out of its mouth...
Violence is one of it's many forms, yet no one notices...
Except for me...

Laying in the dark looking up fo a light...
Only to see that all the stars have been blocked out by this thing...
Voices come from the shadows trying to warn of the harm this thing will bring...
Evil is this thing's name...

Left alone to fend for myself...
Over my head birds shall never sing...
Violins play at the funerals that no one attend...
Every time I try to show you, you can't see bcause the lies have blinded you...

Listen to me please?
Our lives our over and you don't even care...
Verse after verse I preach and all you hear is that thing...
Every one is lost in that sick creature's presence...

Love...
Only I know that it is harming everyone...
Victory is its and I am going to die alone...
Eat, drink, sleep, love, die a moster...

L
O
V
E

The Tail of the Butterfly and the Bat

Fluttering around so happy to be free in the sky with no boundaries...
Flying so up high...
Trying to be one with the sun...
Until it sets...
Then it glows...
It glows so brightly in the light of the moon...
It shows its beauty proudly as it has no worries...
Then it's over...

Roaming the skies...
So fast...
Looking to kill...
Following the soft glow...
Preparing its so swift strike...
Its so dark and ugly...
It shall show how much pain it feels...
It shall make this be the end...
That is the way it is...

Pain comes to those who are happy...
Death is always waiting to strike those who will feel him the most...
Fear this, for you may be next...
You can never be happy without paying Death's price...
There is always going to be pain for those who feel happiness...
Remember this always...

-To Another Day Sitting Here Waiting For Death To Leave Me Alove-
